resources.string: The user doesn\'t have an iPay account
Enter OTP sent to your mobile
Password must contain minimum 8 characters and be alphanumeric.
Please select the from date first
Passport ID should be 9 characters long
Driving License ID should be 15 characters long
NID should be at least 10 digits long
NID should be max 17 digits long
Business TIN should be 12 digits long
Trade License ID should be 8 digits long
Vat Registration Certificate ID should be 11 digits long
iPay will be pleased to discuss any concern or scope of improvement in our Payment Application. Please feel free to contact us.
Your password is changed successfully. Now you will be logged out from all devices. Please login again to continue.
You have no bank account linked with iPay. Please link a bank to add money in your iPay account.
You have no payable items at this moment. Click + button to add a fee to pay.
No transaction to show right now.
If you forget your password and try to recover it, we will send text messages to the persons in your Trusted Network, you will be asked to enter the codes contained in those messages.

Tap + to add a person to your Trusted Network.

If you forget your password and try to recover it, we will send text messages to the persons in your Trusted Network.
You will be asked to enter the codes contained in those messages.
Removing device from your trusted device list
Please enter a valid mobile number
Please enter the OTP sent to your mobile
Please enter a valid name of minimum 5 characters
Error loading data. Please try again.
Enter the amount we sent to your bank account here.

Steps to verify a bank account: 

Step 1. iPay will send a small amount of money to your bank account, this may take 3â€“5 business days. 
Step 2. You have to contact your bank to know the exact amount. 
Step 3. Tap the name of your bank and select Verify. 
Step 4. Enter the exact amount and tap OK. 

*Entering an incorrect amount 5 times will permanently block the bank account.
Do you want to invite this person to iPay? By inviting to iPay you acknowledge that you know this person personally.

Are you sure you want to remove this account from your bank list?

Declaration by iPay Member for the linked bank account
I am hereby authorizing iPay Systems Ltd to debit or credit my below mentioned bank account for bank transaction instructions generated from the settlement bank of iPay Systems Ltd.

We will deposit a random amount in your bank account as a part of verification process. You need to provide the deposited verification amount to link the bank with your iPay account. Please note that, bank verification process may take up to 3 working days.
Do you want to exit the application?

You can only use one account per device. If you want to use another account from this device, please reinstall the app.
